content:
Dave I hate to do this again, but you gotta help me out man. I can't get on the internet for crap I even came into the office today and I still can't get on. Tried the public and the private one. I'm sending this from my personal phone because I can't even clear the security on my work phone right now. I'm so at a loss about what to do. Working from home is usually great but times like these I wish I could stroll over to the IT dept and get sorted out quick without all of this rigamarole. This all started when I was taking a Zoom call the other day by the way. The whole screen froze up, zoom stopped responding, and my computer crashed. Rebooted it and no more wifi and Zoom won't even open, simple as that. 

---

This is a message received by an IT department. Classify the intent and entities based on the schema provided. An intent may only be selected if all entities therein are extractable from the text. Output on the applicable intents and their entities in YAML format.

rejected:
-   **intent: FAO35N**
    **entities:**
        location: working from home
        computer: selection of mac or pc
